item.title: @elonmusk: And here it is: More damning declassified documents and emails released by@CIADirectorreveal Hillary...
item.description: And here it is: More damning declassified documents and emails released by@CIADirectorreveal Hillary Clinton conspired with the intelligence community and George Soros to overthrow the United States government in 2016: Documents declassified by CIA Director John Ratcliffe‚Äîat the Olympic level. Emails from George Soros‚Äô Open Society Terrorist Foundation: ‚ÄúIt will be a long-term affair to demonize Putin and Trump,‚Äù approved by HRC‚ÄîHillary Rodham Clinton‚Äî‚Äúto tie Trump to Russia as a means of distracting people from her own missing emails, especially if the affair reaches an Olympic level. For now, it serves to provide a post-convention bounce. Later, the FBI will be right there to add more oil to the fire.‚Äù In other words‚Äîyes indeed‚ÄîBarack Hussein Obama was right there, taking it to the Olympic level by ordering a newly manufactured ICA report‚Äîas part of a seditious conspiracy to overthrow the United States government in 2016 and a long-term effort to overthrow the duly elected president of the United States@realDonaldTrumpin 2017. Followed by two impeachments, multiple investigations, arrests, indictments, raids, two assassination attempts, and ultimately, the overthrow of the U.S. government in 2020. Any questions?

item.title: @elonmusk: Somali Man in Ohio Says "America Will Become a Muslim State!...Our Goal is to Make America Islamic!"...
